settings.editor: Exploring Prague in 5 days will allow a deep look into the treasures of this beautiful city. With its charming alleys which call you to simply stroll in, its Gothic churches and medival architecture, Prague is simply one of the best cities in Europe.

settings.description_text: 5 Days, 3 Nights
7 Places to visit
5* Luxury hotel
Small group with private guide

settings.editor: Exploring Prague in 5 days will allow a deep look into the treasures of this beautiful city. With its charming alleys which call you to simply stroll in, its Gothic churches and medival architecture, Prague is simply one of the best cities in Europe.

settings.title:
Arrival and private transfer to your
hotel in Prague

settings.editor:
Welcome to Prague. Upon arrival at in the Airport Prague, meet with our staff and we will transfer to your hotel. You will be given your room key and take a rest in the hotel, enjoy the lunch.

After lunch we will pick you up from your hotel and shall start our tour today. Prague - Way of kings, this tour is an excellent introduction to the historical part of Prague, you will follow the steps of Czech Kings who took the same way to reach Prague Castle and St. Vitus Cathedral for the coronation. The journey starts at the Powder Gate, continues through the Old Town Square and through Karlova Street all the way to Charles Bridge where you can admire breathtaking views of Prague Castle and Vltava River.

At night, you will see the different side of Prague. Tonight we will aboard the River Cruise with Dinner to enjoy Pragues history and atmosphere in an unusual way. Choose this night tour to spend an unforgettable evening cruising on Vltava River and admiring illuminated Prague. You will explore the monuments of the Old and New Town of Prague, Vysehrad, National Theatre, Charles Bridge and the unforgettable panoramic views of Prague Castle. During the three hour cruise buffet dinner will be served on board, accompanied by stylish music. The night cruise on Vltava will impress you deeply. After the end of the cruise, buses will take you on a ride through romantic places of Prague by night. Overnight in Prague.

icon_list.text: Arrival airport transfer from Airport Prague
4 breakfasts, 1 lunch and 2 dinners in hotel
Guided Prague - Way of King Tour
Guided Karlstejn Castle Tour with lunch
Guided Ceski Krumlov - UNESCO Sight Tour
Guided Grand City Tour of Prague
Guided Prague - Way of King Tour
All entrance fees to all museums mentioned in the itinerary
Transportation in a fully air-conditioned, non-smoking coach

settings.testimonial_content:
Wow the vacation was raw, intense, and informative all at the same time. 
I am so glad I did it. Amazing guide and very unique. Thank you.

settings.description_text: When we envision the perfect vacation, we see great hotels, amazing food, incredible sightseeing, and above all, we imagine creating memories galore! What we don't picture is what it takes to organize a jaw-dropping, stress-free getaway.
